---
title: "shinyworks"
---

We develop packages to make [shiny](https://shiny.posit.co/r/getstarted/shiny-basics/lesson1/index.html) better.

-   [cookies](https://cookies.shinyworks.org) - Use Browser Cookies with 'shiny'
-   [scenes](https://scenes.shinyworks.org) - Switch Between Alternative 'shiny' UIs
-   [shinyfocus](https://shinyfocus.shinyworks.org) - Use Browser Focus Events in 'shiny'
-   [shinysocial](https://shinysocial.shinyworks.org) - Social Media Modules for 'shiny'
